test.name: US03_TC01_Name and Status are mandatory for creation

kw.name: Given the user has accessed the webapp
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to given URL.

kw.name: Set Window Size
kw.doc: Sets the `width` and `height` of the current window to the specified values.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay in seconds that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Set Selenium Timeout
kw.doc: Sets the timeout in seconds used by various keywords.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: When the page is rendered on the browser
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: And the user tries to add a new pet
Then Pet Name and Pet status are both mandatory fields
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.doc: Waits until `text` appears on current page.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given `text` into text field identified by `locator`.
kw.msg: Typing text 'US03TC01NT01 Name' into text field 'xpath=//div[@class="pet-app"]//input[contains(@class,"pet-name")]'

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks a button identified by `locator`.

kw.name: Pet With Only Name Should Not Exist In The List
Page Should Not Contain Element
kw.doc: Verifies element identified by `locator` is not found on the current page.
kw.msg:
Hello stranger, today's date is :
22-10-2017

Petstore webapp

Hello developer, please note that this app uses a subset of http://petstore.swagger.io/

Create new Pet

Name
Status

List of Pets

Name Status Action
Donald Out of stock
Pluto Available
Mickey Available
US03TC01NT01 Name

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into the log.

kw.msg: Page should not have contained element 'xpath=//span[contains(@class,"pet-name") and text()="US03TC01NT01 Name"]//ancestor::tr[@class="pet-item"]//span[contains(@class,"pet-status") and string-length(text())=0]'

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.status: Page should not have contained element 'xpath=//span[contains(@class,"pet-name") and text()="US03TC01NT01 Name"]//ancestor::tr[@class="pet-item"]//span[contains(@class,"pet-status") and string-length(text())=0]'

Click On Pet Name And Check It Is Editable
